languages.text: "Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}изничтожение диверсантов{/d}. И мы готовы щедро отплатить за {mf|его|ее} благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно. А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу за изничтожение диверсантов. И мы готовы щедро отплатить за {mf|его|ее} благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно. А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."
languages.original_text: "Дом Орселлио глубоко обязан Вольному Торговцу за {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}изничтожение диверсантов{/d}. И мы готовы щедро отплатить за {mf|его|ее} благородство. Полагаю, пакта о дружбе и союзе, подкрепленного несколькими крайне редкими артефактами, должно быть достаточно. А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the destruction of saboteurs, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. I trust a treaty of friendship and alliance enforced by transfer of several artifacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the destruction of saboteurs, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. I trust a treaty of friendship and alliance enforced by transfer of several artifacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."

We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “行商浪人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}消灭了那些破坏者{/d}，奥赛罗家族对此深表感谢。我们愿意报答行商浪人如此慷慨仁慈的行为。我们相信，通过转让几件极其稀有的造物，应该就足以表达我们双方的友好态度，缔结联盟关系了。来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人消灭了那些破坏者，奥塞罗家族对此深表感谢。我们愿意报答行商浪人如此慷慨仁慈的行为。我们相信，通过转让几件极其稀有的造物，应该就足以表达我们双方的友好态度，缔结联盟关系了。来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «La casa Orsellio está extremadamente agradecida a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente por {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruir a los saboteadores{/d} y estamos dispuestos a responder a tan magnánimo gesto. Esperamos que con un tratado de amistad y alianza, apoyado por la transferencia de varios artefactos singulares, sea suficiente. Y ahora vamos, pequeña, es hora de que vayamos a tu nueva casa para terminar lo que empezamos».
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Orsellio está extremadamente agradecida a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente por destruir a los saboteadores y estamos dispuestos a responder a tan magnánimo gesto. Esperamos que con un tratado de amistad y alianza, apoyado por la transferencia de varios artefactos singulares, sea suficiente. Y ahora vamos, pequeña, es hora de que vayamos a tu nueva casa para terminar lo que empezamos».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家は自由開拓者が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}妨害工作を阻止{/d}してくれたことに深く感謝している。このような寛大な行為には喜んで応えたい。我々は友好と同盟の契約を締結し、希少価値の高いアーティファクトを譲り渡そう。さあ、来なさい、我が子よ、我々が始めたことを終わらせるために、お前の新しい家に向けて出発する時が来たのだ」
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家は自由開拓者が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}妨害工作を阻止{/d}してくれたことに深く感謝している。このような寛大な行為には喜んで応えたい。我々は友好と同盟の契約を締結し、希少価値の高いアーティファクトを譲り渡そう。さあ、来なさい、我が子よ、我々が始めたことを終わらせるために、お前の新しい家に向けて出発する時が来たのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Das Haus Orsellio ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} für die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}Vernichtung der Saboteure{/d} sehr dankbar, und wir sind willens, eine derart großzügige Geste zu erwidern. Wir sind sicher, dass ein Freundschafts- und Bündnisvertrag, verbunden mit der Übergabe einiger ausgesprochen seltener Artefakte, ausreicht. Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Orsellio ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} für die Vernichtung der Saboteure sehr dankbar, und wir sind willens, eine derart großzügige Geste zu erwidern. Wir sind sicher, dass ein Freundschafts- und Bündnisvertrag, verbunden mit der Übergabe einiger ausgesprochen seltenen Artefakte, ausreicht. Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « La maison Orsellio remercie chaleureusement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}anéanti les saboteurs{/d}. Nous pensons qu'un traité d'amitié et d'alliance accompagné du transfert de plusieurs artefacts rarissimes suffiront à prouver toute l'étendue de notre gratitude. Et maintenant, mon enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Orsellio remercie chaleureusement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'avoir anéanti les saboteurs. Nous pensons qu'un traité d'amitié et d'alliance accompagné du transfert de plusieurs artefacts rarissimes suffiront à prouver toute l'étendue de notre gratitude. Et maintenant, mon enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}sabotajcıların yok edilmesi{/d} nedeniyle Hür Tacir'e derinden minnettardır ve bu asil bir jestin karşılığını vermek ister. Birtakım son derece nadir eserlerle taçlandırılmış bir dostluk ve müttefiklik anlaşmasının yeterli olacağını umuyoruz. Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply grateful to the Rogue Trader for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_HelpedNaviTraditionalists}destruction of the saboteurs{/d}, and we are willing to reciprocate such a magnanimous gesture. We trust that a treaty of friendship and alliance underpinned by the transfer of several artefacts of exceeding rarity will suffice. Now come, child, it is time we depart for your new home so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi, sabotajcıların yok edilmesi nedeniyle Hür Tacir'e derinden minnettar ve böyle asil bir jestin karşılığını vermek istiyor. Bazı son derece nadir eserlerle taçlandırılmış bir dostluk ve müttefiklik anlaşmasının yeterli olacağını umarız. Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
